title: Why does my phone crash when I scan barcodes ?
content: A couple of weeks ago I decided to try Sam's Club Scan and Go feature while shopping. As I proceeded to scan my items I noticed after the first scan my pixel 4xl goes black, and the only way to unfreeze it is restart the phone. I thought it was the app so I paid no attention to the issue but recently I just tried scanning a barcode again with another app and the same thing happened..â€¦
